Articles.Content:
Enjoy!

Cupcake...

Nice one!

I vote advanced Matador tutorial for the next one, but of course the Moth one shouldn't be too far behind

Nice one!

I vote advanced Matador tutorial for the next one, but of course the Moth one shouldn't be too far behind

If you get time let me know how you get on with the new Moth LV.

Cupcake...

You made a LV for the Moth too? Definitely gonna check it out as soon as I get the chance. The last Moth I used was sent up on one of my own rockets IIRC.

At the moment I have some Matadors on Mun and Minmus, and I look forward to add one to my Duna fleet. Never did interpanetary stuff yet, but I have a Duna window coming up and some nice stuff parked in LKO.

Working on a ISRU refuelling rig for the Matadors at the moment, guess I end up with something like you did for the Tadpole/Toad.

How is the Puff Puff on Duna, btw??

I'm stuck with Minmus for the Moth for the time being, but once I get the hang of interplanetary stuff I look forward to test it some more.

You made a LV for the Moth too? Definitely gonna check it out as soon as I get the chance. The last Moth I used was sent up on one of my own rockets IIRC.

At the moment I have some Matadors on Mun and Minmus, and I look forward to add one to my Duna fleet. Never did interpanetary stuff yet, but I have a Duna window coming up and some nice stuff parked in LKO.

Working on a ISRU refuelling rig for the Matadors at the moment, guess I end up with something like you did for the Tadpole/Toad.

How is the Puff Puff on Duna, btw??

I'm stuck with Minmus for the Moth for the time being, but once I get the hang of interplanetary stuff I look forward to test it some more.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/27424-Cupcake-s-Dropship-Dealership?p=2216600&viewfull=1#post2216600 Enjoy!

The Puff Puff should work on Duna just fine, you got a bit of base building to do there? In fact you can probably use the new LV I made for the Moth, that's got more then enough Grunt to get a Puff Puff to Duna. BTW feel free to show any screenies from your adventures.

Cupcake...

Hi cupcake,

good to see you back.

I like your designs, I may make another series of contract for them, similar to the Sprite contract pack I did for 0.90

any chance of the sprite coming back?

LGG

Hi cupcake,

good to see you back.

I like your designs, I may make another series of contract for them, similar to the Sprite contract pack I did for 0.90

any chance of the sprite coming back?

LGG

Sweet man, let me know how you get on with the contract pack. I'm afraid the Sprite won't be making a return as the new aero model post 1.0 is not very dropship friendly.

Cupcake...
